title: What are the most creative music videos? - Quora

response.answer_text: Music videos can be an ideal vehicle for an artistic statement. It is in short, it has built-in springboard, and it is suitable for both intangible and verbal statements. Here are the most creative and interesting music videos check out below. You can also download these videos with best video downloader.
